pages.text: Vony ne volodiyutʹ znannyam pro tse, ne zrobyly yikhnikh batʹkiv. Shcho blasphemy vytikayuchyy z yikhnikh hyrl! Shcho vony vymovlyayutʹ velyka brekhnya
Vy mozhete osudyty sebe vnaslidok yikhnʹoyi vidpovidi do tsiyeyi rozpovidi, ta yikh disbelieving u tse; vy mozhete buty zasmucheni
My prykrasyly vse na zemli, aby vyprobuvaty yikh, ta takym chynom rozriznyuyemo tsi sered nykh kotrykh pratsyuyemo righteousness
Inevitably, my vytremo vse na tse, lyshayuchy tse povnistyu bezplidne
Chomu shche vy dumayete my rozpovidayemo vam pro lyudey pechery, ta nomeriv zv'yazanykh z nymy? Vony ye sered nashykh wondrous znakiv
Koly yunaky vzyaly prytulok u pecheri, vony skazaly, "Nash Lord, ny zlyvy z Vashym myloserdyam, ta blahoslovlyayutʹ nashi spravy z Vashym kerivnytstvom
My todi opechataly yikhni vushra u pecheri dlya predetermined chyslo rokiv
Todi my resurrected yim pobachyty kotri dvokh storin mohly rozrakhuvaty tryvalistʹ yikhnʹoho perebuvannya tam
My rozpovidayemo do vas yikhnya istoriya, pravdyvo. Vony yunaky shcho viryly v yikhnʹomu Lordu, ta my zbilʹshyly yikhnye kerivnytstvo

My posylyly yikhni serdenʹka koly vony vstaly ta proholosheni: "Nash tilʹky Lord yavlyaye soboyu Lorda neba ta zemli. My budemo nikoly ne obozhnyuvaty budʹ- yakoho inshoho boha bilya Yoho. Inakshe, my by daleko astray

Osʹ nashi lyudy vstanovlyuyuchi bohy bilya Yoho. Yakby tilʹky vony mohly zabezpechyty budʹ-yakyy dokaz pidtrymaty yikhniy stend! Khto bilʹshe z·hubnyy nizh khto vyhotovlyaye brekhnyu ta prypysuye yim do BOHA
